oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MPL - a program for computations with iterated integrals on moduli spaces of curves of genus zero
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bogner, Christian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Computational Physics
High Energy Physics - Phenomenology
High Energy Physics - Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce the computer program MPL for computations with homotopy invariant iterated integrals on moduli spaces $\mathcal{M}_{0,n}$ of curves of genus 0 with $n$ ordered marked points. The program is an implementation of the algorithms presented in [13], based on Maple. It includes the symbol map and procedures for the analytic computation of period integrals on $\mathcal{M}_{0,n}.$ It supports the automated computation of a certain class of Feynman integrals.
